name: Neon Warrior (itch) (4AGProd)
description:
As the Blue Shape, you are tasked with defeating the evil Pink and Red Shapes. The hordes will haunt you, but you must prevail.

Features:

-Upgrade system: buy special weapons, increase health, and get better drop rates.

-Achievements: Can you get them all?

-Strategy Shooting: decide which weapons work with the different levels. Some may do better than others depending on where you are.

-Replay: With 20 levels, 60 level challenges, and a survival mode, there are plenty of chances to blow up the evil Pink and Red Shapes.
